comment.author: 23682239@N07
comment._content: The Showground Pavilion is at the southern end of the showground, so the photo is between 1924 and 1938.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/23682239@N07] Thanks for getting us started! Where is the showground - could you add a note over the spot on the photo? The option is under "Actions - Add Note".

Thanks

AB

comment.author: 23682239@N07
comment._content:
This photo is identical to one held in the W A Bayley collection at Wollongong Library, where it is erroneously dated 1959. The biggest giveaway is the vacant paddock where Kiama High School (opened 1954) was built..

I believe that at least part of Kiama Hospital (opened 1930) is visible in the photo, so it can probably be narrowed down to 1928-38.

comment.author: 23682239@N07
comment._content:
Almost there. 

The Olympic Pool was commenced in 1934, using relief labour. The amount of fresh concrete visible suggests the photo was taken around 1936-7, before the dressing sheds were erected. .

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/23682239@N07] Going great guns with this one - you've really narrowed it down!
AG
